name: FunTriviaQuestions
0:
”Alexa, open fun trivia questions”
”Alexa, launch fun trivia questions”
”Alexa, start fun trivia questions”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fun trivia questions
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Fun Trivia Questions" is an Alexa skill designed to challenge your knowledge with fun questions and secret fun sounds.Test yourself and compete with friends, but most importantly: Try not to laugh!!!

Users are asked general questions with random fart and must answer with a "yes" or "no." Each time the user guesses the answer, they earn one point. Every ten questions the user's point will be announced.

The multiplayer mode supports up to two Players.
In the multiplayer mode each 20 questions will reveal the players' scores.

Challenge whoever you like in the multiplayer mode and become the winning Player!
